attributes.action: Stop nuisance/illegal calls and texts once and for all
attributes.background: Nuisance calls are relentless, there hasn't been a day gone by in the last few years that I haven't received them and it's getting to the point that there needs to be an investigation into this. It's incredibly stressful to be constantly harassed and I don't believe enough has been done.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/167409
